question.title: Could not find Confluent Kafka Avro Serializer & Schema Registry Client in Maven
question.body:
I am trying to add Confluent dependencies for Kafka Avro serialization and Schema Registry Client in my Spring Boot application. However, when I try to build the project using Maven, I get the following error:

Could not find artifact io.confluent:kafka-schema-registry-client:pom:7.8.0 in central (https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2)

View Error :-

<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.confluent/kafka-avro-serializer -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.confluent</groupId>
            <artifactId>kafka-avro-serializer</artifactId>
            <version>7.8.0</version>
        </dependency>
        <!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.confluent/kafka-schema-registry-client -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.confluent</groupId>
            <artifactId>kafka-schema-registry-client</artifactId>
            <version>7.8.0</version>
        </dependency>
